name: Program Design
description: Transforming large programs requires close relationships with varied stakeholders and deep understanding of the systems and problem sets. By embedding myself within the teams and working alongside the experts, I help them design solutions that succeed for program participants and stakeholders alike.

name: Interactive Experiences
description: I am drawn to the beauty and challenges of crafting immersive multimedia experiences. Whether the user is a guest at a museum or a visitor at a corporate campus, I find it satisfying and fulfilling to infuse their experience with joy and delight.

name: Complex Problems
description: There are many wicked problems in the health domain. I grapple with them by first building a deep understanding of the systems and processes. Then to make them understandable and manageable, I apply an iterative design process to breaking down and visualizing the complexities.

name: Health IT
description: The health industry expends many billions of dollars creating, maintaining, and reviewing documentation. Poor interfaces and processes can make these core tasks frustrating, awkward, and error-prone. How might we design tools that improve both provider efficiency and improve patient outcomes?

name: AI in Health
description: There are many opportunities in healthcare to apply artificial intelligence. How might we design tools that leverage AI to streamline documentation and improve decision-making processes?
